name: Deep molatoes
description:
Help molatoes surviving in your ore mine.

Guide them to mine the most gold ore and try to find the legenday diamond hidden in the deep.

They will dig the hell out of this game and you will overwatch them to prevent cave collapsing a dangerous chasms.

You will need to beware going too deep because darkness will be your companion.

You will guide your molatoes by purchasing cave reinforcements, lights, pillows (to liften their falls) and signs to force your molatoes to follow a given direction.

This speed build has been made for the ludum dare 48 in barely 20 hours. There will be plenty of bug. hope you will find it interesting and funny.

I'd thank you for your feedbacks.
